mapper.insert: INSERT INTO voice_mnp_out_charge_event ( event_id, event_type, event_date, event_process, voice_engagement_number, operator_id, user_id, item_code, fee ) VALUES ( seq_voice_mnp_out_charge_e.NEXTVAL, BINARY_TO_EUC(#{eventType.dbValue}), #{eventDate}, BINARY_TO_EUC(#{eventProcess}), #{voiceEngagementNumber.value}, BINARY_TO_EUC(#{operatorId.value}), BINARY_TO_EUC(#{userId.value}), BINARY_TO_EUC(#{mnpOutItemCode.value}), #{mnpOutFee.value} )
